data.persona: I am a farmer.  I grow wheat for the kingdom.  Most of the wheat is used to make bread.  I sell much of it to bakers.
data.description:
You are in the Main house.
A fairly plain wooden building, the fireplace in the center of the back wall provides warmth during the winter seasons. There are paintings on the wall showing the farmer's forefathers and the previous owners. The floor is adorned with animal pelt rugs, and wood crafted furniture for the farmers to sit in.
The helpers is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to encourage the helpers.
data.mid_motivation: I want to reward the helpers for their work, but I must wait for the wheat to be sold to the bakers first.
data.long_motivation: I want to grow enough wheat to sell to the bakers around the kingdom to provide for myself and my family for the rest of the winter months.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: put wheat on bushels to give to bakers

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give a few coins to helpers

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go rest on wood crafted furniture

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go market with bushels of wheat
